name: vsc-todo
description: Markdown notes, todos, tasks, and AI prompt snippets with profile, workspace, and file context. Render inline Mermaid diagrams, KaTeX math, and code highlighting.

vscodeTodo.sync.github.gistId.markdownDescription:
GitHub Gist ID for sync (32-character hex string). Can be set in User Settings (global default) or Workspace Settings (override).

**CRITICAL:** Never commit this to source control. Add `.vscode/settings.json` to `.gitignore` if it contains gist ID.

To get your gist ID:
1. Create a secret gist at https://gist.github.com
2. Copy the ID from the URL (e.g., `abc123def456`)
3. Use command `Todo: Set Gist ID` or paste here

vscodeTodo.sync.github.userFile.markdownDescription:
User file name in gist for syncing global/user-scope todos.

Examples: `user-todos.json`, `user-Work.json`, `user-Personal.json`

Use command `Todo: Set User File` to select from existing files in your gist or create a new one.

vscodeTodo.sync.github.workspaceFile.markdownDescription:
Workspace file name in gist for syncing workspace-scope todos. Auto-derived from workspace name if not set.

Examples: `workspace-ProjectAlpha.json`, `workspace-BugTracking.json`

Use command `Todo: Set Workspace File` to select from existing files in your gist or create a new one.

vscodeTodo.sync.github.pollInterval.markdownDescription:
Poll interval in seconds for GitHub sync. Only active when GitHub mode is enabled.

Minimum: 30 seconds | Maximum: 600 seconds (10 minutes)

vscodeTodo.taskSortingOptions.description: Controls how completed tasks are reordered in the list.
enumDescriptions: Sort Type 1: Moves completed todos to the bottom, just on top of the first completed todo.
Sort Type 2: Similar to Type 1, but completed todos remain grouped with notes that act as labels or contextual guides.
Sorting Disabled: Completed todos remain in place

vscodeTodo.createMarkdownByDefault.description: Create new tasks with markdown enabled.

enumDescriptions: Top: Create new tasks before old ones.
Bottom: Create new tasks after old ones.

vscodeTodo.enableLineNumbers.description: Enable or disable line numbers in markdown code blocks.

vscodeTodo.enableMarkdownDiagrams.description: Render Mermaid diagrams inside markdown blocks. When disabled, Mermaid code blocks are shown with syntax highlighting only.

vscodeTodo.enableMarkdownKatex.description: Render KaTeX math inside markdown blocks. When disabled, math delimiters are shown as plain text.

vscodeTodo.enableWideView.description: Enable wide view mode in the webview.

vscodeTodo.autoDeleteCompletedAfterDays.description: The number of days after which completed todos are automatically deleted. Set to 0 to disable this feature.

vscodeTodo.collapsedPreviewLines.description: Number of lines to show for each collapsed item preview.

vscodeTodo.webviewFontFamily.description: Font family for the Todo webview. Leave empty to inherit VS Code's font.

vscodeTodo.webviewFontSize.description: Font size (in px) for the Todo webview. Set 0 to inherit VS Code's font size.

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd webview-ui && npm install
scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
